content: page 1 of 2 a hug and a rug for your mug what you need  4 5mm needles  1 ball of woolganic organic merino 8ply dk or equivalent heavy dk or light worsted yarn  yarn needle for weaving in the ends and attaching button  button for your mug hug  crochet needle for weaving in the fringe this pattern is licence free feel free to knit this for small scale commercial purposes making sure to credit cathy rubin the designer © cathy rubin aka the barbarian horde 2015 australia page 2 of 2 mug hug mug rug cosy for standard sized 10inch/25cms diameter mug coaster cast on 45sts cast on 25sts row 1 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 1 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 2 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 2 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 3 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 3 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 4 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 4 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 6 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 6 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 7 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 7 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 8 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 8 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 9 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 9 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 10 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 10 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 11 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 11 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 12 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 12 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 13 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k2tog yo k3 repeat the last 12 row 2 times more row 14 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 15 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 cast off using this method row 16 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 https //www youtube com/watch v=53mtbkyf5cq row 17 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 18 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 for the fringe cut two strands 10cms in length attach two fringes to each knitted square using this link row 19 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 https //youtu be/ogqko9cp57m row 20 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 21 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 and then block gently row 22 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 row 23 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 k5 p5 row 24
